heading: ***WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TONIGHT FOR BENNINGTON AND WINDHAM COUNTIES, SOUTH INTO MA, WEST TO THE HUDSON VALLEY***Today
text: Partly sunny from the Adirondacks and Rt. 4 north. Becoming cloudy south, with a rising chance of snow from Lake George, east along Rt. 9, south in MA, possibly mixed with rain in the valleys. Highs in the upper 20s north to mid 30s south. Winds light and variable.

heading: Tonight
text: Any mix changes to snow, with 1 to 4 inches from Lake George and Rt. 9 south. A little evening snow north to I-89. Partly cloudy through Quebec, and northeast of Rt. 302. Colder. Lows in the teens, single numbers far north, low 20s far south. Winds light, mainly north less than 10 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Becoming mostly sunny from I-89 north, and partly sunny south and west. Highs in the 30s. Winds light and variable.
